T02D3065:120a-1: a'arya aa tsa la s'adha nam /
T02D3065:120a-3: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3065:120a-4: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3065:120a-5: thog mar sngags pas gsum la skyabs song zhing //
T02D3065:120a-6: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed byas rjes su //
T02D3065:120a-7: skad cig tsam gyis stong par rab dmigs nas //
T02D3065:120a-8: rab dkar padma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor blta //
T02D3065:120a-9: de steng mgon po mi g-yo sku mdog dkar //
T02D3065:120b-0: g-yas g-yon phyag gis ral gri sdigs mdzub @120b mdzad ;
T02D3065:120b-1: / zhabs gnyis bus mo mthil gyis rab bzhugs pa //
T02D3065:120b-2: rin chen dar gyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya //
T02D3065:120b-3: lhag pa'i khro rgyal de yi mdun du yang //
T02D3065:120b-4: de nyid ji lta'i bcom ldan 'das bsam bya //
T02D3065:120b-5: de dag thugs kar padma nyi ma la //
T02D3065:120b-6: h'um la gzhan gyis bskor ba dmar bar blta //
T02D3065:120b-7: de nas yi ge 'bru bcu bzlas bya ste //
T02D3065:120b-8: sngags phreng kha nas khar zhugs ye shes dgug / lte ba nas 'thon der zhugs bdag nyid kyi //
T02D3065:120b-9: snying gar bslan pa 'khor lo bzhin du bsam //
T02D3065:120b-10: de ltar zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu //
T02D3065:120b-11: thun gsum nyid du bsgom pa gang yin des //
T02D3065:120b-12: bka' dang bstan bcos kun gyi tshig dang don //
T02D3065:120b-13: bltas btsam gyis khong du chud par 'gyur //
T02D3065:120b-14: gzhan yang kun la mi 'jigs spobs pa 'thob //
T02D3065:120b-15: snyan dngags bstan bcos thogs med rtsom nus shing //
T02D3065:120b-16: de yi smra ba sus kyang bzlog mi nus //
T02D3065:120b-17: de phyir 'di 'dra gar yang rnyed par dka' //
T02D3065:120b-18: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
